about_the_game:
"Red October" will transport you to the secret research center Oktyabrsk-21, where work is in full swing on Project "Red October" – a revolutionary energy source based on cold nuclear fusion. You will take on the role of Dmitry Sokolov, a young nuclear physicist who has just arrived in the city and immediately finds himself at the epicenter of events capable of changing the world.

What awaits you in "Red October":

  • Gripping Plot: Uncover the secrets of Project "Red October", face intrigue, industrial espionage, and ethical dilemmas. Expect unexpected twists, difficult decisions, and a struggle for the future of science.

  • Living Characters: Meet ambitious scientists, tough party officials, and mysterious intelligence agents. Each character is an individual with their own motives and secrets.

  • Atmosphere of the Soviet Union: Immerse yourself in the era of the Cold War, explore the meticulously recreated science city, and feel the spirit of competition and secrecy that reigned in Soviet science.

  • Science Fiction and Thriller: "Red October" is a story about scientific progress, its price, and its consequences. You can expect thrilling investigations, tense dialogues, and unexpected discoveries.

  • Moral Choice: Who should be entrusted with the revolutionary technology? How can its use for the benefit of humanity be ensured? You will have to make difficult decisions that will affect the future not only of Oktyabrsk-21, but of the entire world.

short_description: Red October: A scientific thriller in the USSR. Physicist Sokolov is drawn into the race for the energy of the future in the closed city of Oktyabrsk-21. Intrigue, espionage, moral choices. The fate of the world is in your hands!

English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Japanese
